Source code for indicnlp.transliterate.sinhala_transliterator

class SinhalaDevanagariTransliterator(object): 

[docs]    """
        A Devanagari to Sinhala transliterator based on explicit Unicode Mapping
    """

    sinhala_devnag_map={
                u'\u0d82':u'\u0902', 
                u'\u0d83':u'\u0903',

    @staticmethod
    def devanagari_to_sinhala(text):

[docs]        return u''.join([ SinhalaDevanagariTransliterator.devnag_sinhala_map.get(c,c) for c in text ])

    @staticmethod

    def sinhala_to_devanagari(text):

[docs]        return u''.join([ SinhalaDevanagariTransliterator.sinhala_devnag_map.get(c,c) for c in text ])
